remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管类名称为, 但元素名称为。 `Item`Although the class name is , the element name is `Item`. 在移动页上, 使用[ \](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7152e195-e1d6-4a91-9dba-e0536a676e79)元素声明项。On a mobile page, you declare an item by using the [\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7152e195-e1d6-4a91-9dba-e0536a676e79) element. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性的选定项的索引, 通过类操作对象中的项。The following code example shows how you manipulate items in the object through the class by using the selected item's index of the property. member this.Text : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置项中包含的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text contained in the item.

summary.span: 此 API 已废弃不用。
若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该属性为空字符串或从不按编程方式或通过构造函数进行设置, 则它将返回指定列表项的属性值。If the property is an empty string or is never set, either programmatically or through the constructor, it returns the value of the property for the specified list item. 可以通过`Text`使用属性或内部文本来指定属性。The property can be specified by using the `Text` attribute, or as inner text. 如果以这两种方式指定了属性, 则内部文本始终优先。If the property is specified in both ways, the inner text always takes precedence. 但是, 如果以编程方式设置该属性, 则会自动删除内部文本, 并优先使用新设置的属性。However, if the property is programmatically set, the inner text is automatically removed and the newly set property takes precedence.
